rules.label: Chronological Sequence
rules.description: Indicates a temporal sequence where one item occurs before another.

rules.label: Contemporaneous Elements
rules.description: Indicates that two elements are contemporaneous.

rules.label: Temporal Transformation
rules.description: Represents an object that changes over time.

rules.label: Data Provenance
rules.description: Indicates the provenance of data, often linking to source nodes.

rules.label: Contrasting Time Branches
rules.description: Represents contrasting or mutually exclusive Time Branches.

rules.label: Has First Epoch
rules.description: Indicates the initial epoch associated with a node.

rules.label: Survives In Epoch
rules.description: Indicates that a node continues to exist in a given epoch.

rules.label: Part of Activity
rules.description: Indicates that a node is part of a specific activity.

rules.label: Has Property
rules.description: Connects a node to one of its properties.

rules.label: Extracted From
rules.description: Indicates that information is derived from a particular source.

rules.label: Combines
rules.description: Indicates that a node combines information from various sources.

rules.label: Included in Timebranch
rules.description: Indicates that a node belongs to a specific time branch.

rules.label: Generic Connection
rules.description: Represents a non-specific connection between two nodes.

rules.label: Has author
rules.description: Represents the connection of a node with its author.

rules.label: Has geoposition
rules.description: Represents a connection with the geoposition node of a given node

rules.label: Has a linked resource
rules.description: Represents a connection between a node and a linked resource node

rules.label: Has a representation 3D model
rules.description: Represents a connection between a stratigraphic, extractor or document node and representation 3D model

rules.label: Has Semantic Shape
rules.description: Connects any node to its semantic shape representation
